p: All populations are generally susceptible to SARS-CoV-2. The elderly and people with underlying diseases or low immune function are more likely to become severe cases [30, 43]. In addition, pregnant women and newborns infected with SARS-CoV-2 are also prone to develop severe pneumonia [44, 45]. Thus, these vulnerable patients should be considered as a focus in the prevention and management of SARS-CoV-2 infection.
